name: Fire Escape (itch) (Haraflax)
description:
The Boss is comming and he is Really angry and YOU, yeah that's right YOU have been slacking for the last month. But in a world where you need to be "Hands On" to fire someone all YOU need to do is to escape getting fired. 

Movement = WASD 

Jump = Spacebar

Look around = Mouse Movment

Interact = LMB (Left Mouse Button)

Slide = Control

Pause game = Escape

Free Look = Mouse Movment
